00051 #define EOS 0xFFFF
00052 
00057 enum LineBreakClass
00058 {
00059         /* This is used to signal an error condition. */
00060         LBP_Undefined,  
00062         /* The following break classes are treated in the pair table. */
00063         LBP_OP,                 
00064         LBP_CL,                 
00065         LBP_QU,                 
00066         LBP_GL,                 
00067         LBP_NS,                 
00068         LBP_EX,                 
00069         LBP_SY,                 
00070         LBP_IS,                 
00071         LBP_PR,                 
00072         LBP_PO,                 
00073         LBP_NU,                 
00074         LBP_AL,                 
00075         LBP_ID,                 
00076         LBP_IN,                 
00077         LBP_HY,                 
00078         LBP_BA,                 
00079         LBP_BB,                 
00080         LBP_B2,                 
00081         LBP_ZW,                 
00082         LBP_CM,                 
00083         LBP_WJ,                 
00084         LBP_H2,                 
00085         LBP_H3,                 
00086         LBP_JL,                 
00087         LBP_JV,                 
00088         LBP_JT,                 
00090         /* The following break classes are not treated in the pair table */
00091         LBP_AI,                 
00092         LBP_BK,                 
00093         LBP_CB,                 
00094         LBP_CR,                 
00095         LBP_LF,                 
00096         LBP_NL,                 
00097         LBP_SA,                 
00098         LBP_SG,                 
00099         LBP_SP,                 
00100         LBP_XX                  
00101 };
00102 
00107 struct LineBreakProperties
00108 {
00109         utf32_t start;                          
00110         utf32_t end;                            
00111         enum LineBreakClass prop;       
00112 };
00113 
00118 struct LineBreakPropertiesLang
00119 {
00120         const char *lang;                                       
00121         size_t namelen;                                         
00122         struct LineBreakProperties *lbp;        
00123 };
00124 
00129 typedef utf32_t (*get_next_char_t)(const void *, size_t, size_t *);
00130 
00131 /* Declarations */
00132 extern struct LineBreakProperties lb_prop_default[];
00133 extern struct LineBreakPropertiesLang lb_prop_lang_map[];
